name: Battle of Olympus - Free Crypto Game
name_original: Battle of Olympus - Free Crypto Game
description:
Battle of Olympus is an arcade fighting game where players can create their own Greek gods inspired by Zeus, Hades and more to rule over the cyberpunk city of Olympus.

You can play it for free, you can earn $OLYMPUS cryptocurrency as a reward for different actions in the game, and you can earn and trade NFTs in the upcoming Marketplace.

The city of Olympus is searching for its next ruler. Conquer your rivals and grow your followers to become the next leader of the gods. Choose to play for free or mint your NFT to progress through the story, compete in PVP battles, and rise to the top of Olympus.

Play the game
